com.simscale.algorithms

Class FermatGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.simscale.algorithms.FermatGenerator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PrimeGenerator

    public class FermatGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
implements PrimeGenerator
    Implementation of Fermat's algorithm for primality test. Works in O(k × log^2(n) × log log n × log log log n)

    Source: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fermat_primality_test

      • isValidInFermatTest

        private boolean isValidInFermatTest(java.math.BigInteger num,
                                    java.math.BigInteger a)
        Check if the number is valid in fermat test. a ^ num mod num should be 0 to pass the fermat test.
        Parameters:
        num - original number to test for primality
        a - the random number
        Returns:
        if number passes fermat test
